Data.Title: About Us
Data.Title2: Get to know EKOLFX, a leading and innovative company in the global market!
Data.ShortDesc:
Who are we?

Ekol Global Markets, with the most experienced and educated staff of financial markets, combines customer satisfaction with its technological infrastructure and serves to serve as the industry leader in the global markets. The online ECN broker EkolFx has been providing its customers with access to the 1st tier liquidity in the exchange, commodity and exchange for many years. All major currency pairs and cross-currencies, oil, precious metals, stock market indices, blue chips and the largest set of cryptocurrency pairs can be processed in EkolFx.

Why EkolFX?

EkolFx; With its educated and experienced expert staff, it is proud to serve all investors quickly and safely with its infrastructure equipped with current technology and customer-oriented boutique service approach.

With our young, dynamic and progressive point of view, we provide our investors with a unique investment experience by taking our strong financial support behind.

 

  • 700+ Investment vehicle
  • 70+ Payment method
  • Professional investment services
  • Professional analysis in 35 languages
  • Competitive Spread / Swap rates
  • 7/24 money withdrawal
  • 7/24 Price Flow
  • 7/24 Live support
  • Buy Price when depositing money, Calculating based on Buy price
  • 35 Professional service language support in the country
  • Credit Card, Coins, Money Transfer / EFT and many other methods
  • Swap, Swapless account types
  • Bonus for every Investment
  • Lot Refund

 

We serve you with a lot more features.

Our Vision and Mission

EkolFx is a high-tech, reliable ECN broker with a strong reputation. Our customers can benefit from a secure and user-friendly online platform for high-speed processing in 35 global languages and can access many built-in tools for price graph analysis. The most popular trading platform MetaTrader 4/5 fans can also use it.

Trading with EkolFx means: high-performance platform, low-wave spreads, market demand without demand, professional help and access to specific analytical materials and signals.
